Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.leadercard

Class ProductionLeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.leadercard.LeaderCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.leadercard.ProductionLeaderCard
public class ProductionLeaderCard
extends LeaderCard
This LeaderCard awards the user with the permanent addition of a specific Production in their PlayerBoard upon activation

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductionLeaderCard

      public ProductionLeaderCard​(int victoryPoints, CardColor requiredColor, int requiredLevel, int requiredQuantity, ResourceType[] inputType, int[] inputQuantities, ResourceType[] outputType, int[] outputQuantities)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      requiredColor - CardColor of the DevelopmentCards required to activate this card
      requiredLevel - minimum card level accepted by the requirements
      requiredQuantity - number of DevelopmentCards of the specified CardColor and level required to activate this card
      victoryPoints - the card's number of victory points
      inputType - the card's production input resource types
      inputQuantities - the card's production input resource quantities
      outputType - the card's production output resource types
      outputQuantities - the card's production output resource quantities

      public void doAction​(PlayerBoard playerBoard) throws CardIsActiveException
      Calls the specific method for this LeaderCard, addProduction()
      Overrides:
      doAction in class LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - specifies to which PlayerBoard the discount has to be added
      Throws:
      CardIsActiveException - if the card is already active

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      playerBoard - specifies which PlayerBoard to check
      Returns:
